blog.name: pokebiologist
blog.title: Pokémon Biology
blog.description: I'm Theodora, but you can call me Thea! I'm a Battle Girl turned Pokémon Researcher, and I'm excited to share my observations with you. Feel free to ask, submit, request, and share your own findings!

summary: Hi professor ^^ I want to ask for a advice. Late this sumer my Lotad (Lynn) and Psyduck (Nata) has evolved into Lombre and...
question: Hi professor ^^ I want to ask for a advice. Late this sumer my Lotad (Lynn) and Psyduck (Nata) has evolved into Lombre and Golduck. I'm really happy about this, especially since they are both really close with each other. However I now have a problem with satisfying their aquatic needs. In previous winter simple soaking in bathtub and spraying with water was enough to satisfy them, but now they seem to need more. (1/2)
answer:
“Lakes that are close to my home always freeze, so they won’t work for long and river near by is really strong with many whirlpools appearing on the surface. The only other option that I can think of is visiting my local indoor swimming pool, but I’m worried about chlorine in the water. Am I over worrying everything? Thank you for reading and I hope to hear from you ^^ (2/2)“

As with most Pokémon who evolve, Lombre and Golduck need a lot more space than their previous forms. This is especially true of Golduck, who are adapted to spending all day chasing prey around large bodies of water. I’ll be honest, I’m willing to bet that Nata would be happy playing in the rough waters of the river, as that species are famously adept swimmers.

As for your Lynn, Lombre enjoy more space to explore but need much less exercise, as they enjoy being able to hide and store food. If it’s within your budget, a larger aquarium with a hideout would be perfect.

Depending on where you are, what is most common is for trainer to find their nearest Water-Type training facility, whether it’s a fully-fledged Gym or a Pokémon-friendly pool system. They typically have reduced (or entirely free) membership fares during the winter.

Good luck!

-Thea

summary: So, I'm now helping to run a small park for older/disabled pokemon, and a trainer has come to me with a small problem. They have...
question: So, I'm now helping to run a small park for older/disabled pokemon, and a trainer has come to me with a small problem. They have a Herdier that's very old, blind and arthritic, but still wants to play with people, what would be good ways to play with him?
answer:
I would recommend swimming! It’s an activity that is really beneficial for getting exercise without putting too much pressure on joints. 

If you’d prefer an indoors activity, I would play games involving identifying things by scent, and providing new scents as often as possible. These can be in the form of foods, outdoor objects, other Pokémon, perfumes, etc.

-Thea

reblog.comment:

-Thea

If you’d prefer an indoors activity, I would play games involving identifying things by scent, and providing new scents as often as possible. These can be in the form of foods, outdoor objects, other Pokémon, perfumes, etc.

-Thea
trail.content:
I would recommend swimming! It’s an activity that is really beneficial for getting exercise without putting too much pressure on joints.

blog.name: friendsafariserver
blog.title: Friend Safari!
blog.description:
Friend Safari is a SFW, OC-friendly, paragraph-style roleplay server for main series Pokémon games. From Kanto to Alola, the whole Pokémon world is your Cloyster! Members of this server are allowed a total of four played characters, with at least one required to be canonical.

The server is run by a team of five mods who you can learn more about via the mods page. We cultivate an easygoing and open atmosphere, with member comfort and happiness being our top priority.

All of the links are in the drop down menu under Rowlet, labeled Pokémon! Hovering over each Pokémon will tell you what page they link to!

summary: Welcome to the Friend Safari! Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region,...
body:
Welcome to the Friend Safari!

Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region, multiple modes for character interactions, and plenty of in-character events, ours is an active and welcoming group always looking for new members! To learn more about our server, head over to our rules!

Reblog this ad, stop by our blog and check us out!

Rules | Joining | Characters | Timeline

summary: Nidoking - 34
title: Nidoking - 34
body:
Nidoking’s thick tail packs enormously destructive power. With one swing, it can topple a metal transmission tower. Once this Pokemon goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.

- Pokemon Ruby, Sapphire, Omega Ruby, Alpha Sapphire
